title: Millions affected as China's floods move north; more cities hit
content:
1. Millions affected as China's floods move north; more cities hit  The Washington Post
  2. Massive floods strike China's 'iPhone City' after heaviest rains in 1000 years  CNBC Television
  3. Passengers trapped inside submerged subway as deadly floods sweep central China  CNN
  4. Henan floods should lead to better extreme weather response: Global Times editorial  Global Times
  5. China Blasts Dam To Divert Massive Floods In Henan Province  NPR
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 中国の洪水が北上し、さらに多くの都市で数百万人が被害を受ける
